properties.name: binaflow.schema.directory
properties.description: Directory where the protobuf schema files are located.

properties.name: binaflow.http-path
properties.description: Http path for the WebSocket connection.

properties.name: binaflow.unhandled-exceptions.fill-message
properties.description: Fill the 'message' for response Error message when unhandled exceptions occurred.

properties.name: binaflow.unhandled-exceptions.fill-exception-class
properties.description: Fill the 'exception class' for response Error message when unhandled exceptions occurred.

properties.name: binaflow.unhandled-exceptions.fill-stack-trace
properties.description: Fill the 'stack trace' for response Error message when unhandled exceptions occurred.
